description: MainActivity.kt is an Android Kotlin source file implementing the main activity for a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages UI components, game logic, state preservation, and user interactions for a 3x3 grid game.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity handles the game interface, user interactions, game logic, and state management for a Tic Tac Toe game in an Android app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds UI components, restores game state if available, and sets up event listeners.

methods.name: onSaveInstanceState
methods.description: Preserves game state to handle configuration changes such as device rotation.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user moves when a cell is tapped, updates the game state, checks for win/draw, and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: updateTurnIndicator
methods.description: Updates the display to show which player's turn it is.

methods.name: updateStatusMessageFromBoard
methods.description: Updates the status message based on the current game state, showing winner or draw.

methods.name: repaintBoard
methods.description: Refreshes the visual state of the game board, highlighting winning lines if any.

methods.name: highlightWinningCells
methods.description: Highlights the cells that form the winning line with accent color.

methods.name: disableAllCells
methods.description: Disables all board cells to prevent further moves after game over.

methods.name: enableAllEmptyCells
methods.description: Enables all empty cells for new moves.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Determines if the game is a draw (no empty cells and no winner).

methods.name: getWinningLine
methods.description: Checks the board for a winning combination, returns the line indices if found.

methods.name: clearBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board to initial empty state.

methods.name: resetCellViews
methods.description: Resets the visual state of all cell buttons.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Restarts the game by resetting state variables and UI.
